SEARCH
Package librarySE.core

Class WaitlistEntry

java.lang.Object
librarySE.core.WaitlistEntry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class WaitlistEntry extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a single user's request to borrow a library item that is currently unavailable.

Each WaitlistEntry object stores:

  • The unique ID of the requested item
  • The email of the user who is waiting
  • The date when the user joined the waitlist

This class is immutable and implements Serializable to support persistence through JSON or other storage formats (e.g., via FileWaitlistRepository).

Usage Example:


 // When a user tries to borrow an unavailable book:
 WaitlistEntry entry = new WaitlistEntry(
     "BOOK-123",
     "student@najah.edu",
     LocalDate.now()
 );

 // Add the entry to the waitlist
 waitlist.add(entry);
 waitlistRepo.saveAll(waitlist);
Author:
Eman
